entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as one of Harry's thoughts when he casts his Patronus. ("It was of Ron and Hermione that he thought")

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as one of Harry's thoughts when he casts his Patronus. ("It was of Ron and Hermione that he thought")

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who casts his Patronus to repel the Dementors.

entities.name: dementor
entities.description: Dementors are mentioned as creatures that Harry's Patronus is trying to repel. ("The Dementors have retreated")

entities.name: death eater
entities.description: Death Eaters are mentioned as a group of people who are approaching the scene. ("the footsteps of the Death Eaters were becoming louder")

entities.name: patronus
entities.description: Harry's Patronus is mentioned as a silver stag that bursts from his wand and charges at the Dementors.

relationships.description: Harry thought of Ron when he cast his Patronus. ("It was of Ron and Hermione that he thought")
Harry thought of Hermione when he cast his Patronus. ("It was of Ron and Hermione that he thought")
Harry created his Patronus, a silver stag, when he cast the spell "Expecto Patronum!".
The Patronus repelled the Dementors. ("The Dementors have retreated")
